pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, November 15, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Singapore

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Chief Executive Officer of the Development Bank of Singapore Piyush Gupta.

Windows West Room, 20th Floor
Four Seasons Hotel Singapore
190 Orchard Boulevard

Note for media:

    • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Group Chief Investment Officer of the Government Investment Corporation Jeffrey Jaensubhakij.

Windows West Room, 20th Floor
Four Seasons Hotel Singapore
190 Orchard Boulevard

Note for media:

    • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Chief Executive Officer of Razer Inc. and THX Min-Liang Tan.

Windows West Room, 20th Floor
Four Seasons Hotel Singapore
190 Orchard Boulevard

Note for media:

    • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

12:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in an armchair discussion, followed by a Q&A with students at the National University of Singapore.

Auditorium, Ground Floor
National University of Singapore
50 Lower Kent Ridge Road

Note for media:

    • Open coverage

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with President of the Republic of Singapore Halimah Yacob.

Note for media:

    • Official photographers only

3:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Group Chief Executive Officer of PSA International Tan Chong Meng.

Reception Room, 40th Floor
Port of Singapore Building
7B Keppel Road

Note for media:

    • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit Fort Canning Park.

Note for media:

    • Pooled photo opportunity  

5:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Windows West Room, 20th Floor
Four Seasons Hotel Singapore
190 Orchard Boulevard

Note for media:

    • Open coverage

7:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Element AI Office Launch Reception, and deliver brief remarks.

Sinfonia Restaurant
11 Empress Place, 01-01
Victoria Concert Hall

Note for media:

    • Open coverage for remarks

Media appearances

2:00 p.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air on the BBC.
